data.text: 1. Unplug the appliance and let it cool. 2. Tip the contents of the filter holder into the bin. 3. Clean the outside surfaces of the appliance with a damp cloth. 4. Hand wash the carafe and filter holder. Descale regularly, (at least monthly). Descale the appliance at least monthly with a proprietary descaler. Follow the instructions on the package of descaler. Products returned under guarantee with faults due to scale will be subject to a repair charge.
